products.name: Redmi 9A
products.subtitle: Redmi 9A (Midnight Black, 2GB RAM, 32GB Storage) | 2GHz Octa-core Helio G25 Processor
features: 13MP rear camera with AI portrait, AI scene recognition, HDR, pro mode | 5MP front camera
16.58 centimeters (6.53 inch) HD+ multi-touch capacitive touchscreen with 1600 x 720 pixels resolution, 268 ppi pixel density and 20:9 aspect ratio
Android v10 operating system with upto 2.0GHz clock speed Mediatek Helio G25 octa core processor
1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
Box also includes: Power adapter, USB cable, sim eject tool, warranty card and user guide
products.description: Redmi 9A comes with Octa-core Helio G25 processor and upto 2.0GHz clock speed. It also comes with 13 MP AI Rear camera along with 5 MP front camera. Redmi 9A also features 16.58 centimeters (6.53-inch) HD + display with 720x1600 pixels. It also comes with 5000 mAH large battery.

products.name: VU
products.subtitle: Vu 139 cm (55 inches) 4K Ultra HD Smart Android LED TV
features: Resolution: 4K Ultra HD (3840x2160) | Refresh Rate: 60 hertz
Sound : 30 Watts output | Dolby Audio | DTS Virtual-X Surround Sound, TruBass HDX, TruSurround X, Dialog Clarity
Smart TV Features : Official Android Pie 9.0 | Google play store | ActiVoice Remote Control | Google Eco-system (Movie, TV, Music, Games) | Google Games | Chromecast Built-In | Bluetooth 5.0
Display : Ultra-edge 4K Display with 40 % Enhanced Brightness | Dolby Vision, HDDR10, HLG | VOD upscaling | Cricket Mode | PC and Game Mode
products.description: The Vu Ultra TV is not just a television but also a complete theatre experience for VOD content. The Vu Ultra TV offers Ultra-edge 4K Display with 40 % Enhanced Brightness with Ultra-sonic Sound and 30 Watt Box Speakers with Dolby Audio for an incredible picture and sound experience of VODâ€™s. This smart television gives Ultimate Performance with 64-bit Quad-Core Processor and runs on official Android Pie 9.0 with the Google eco system for pre-loaded premium apps, to ensure both picture & sound quantity and the best quality from your streaming content. Vu puts more control in your hands with the ActiVoice remote and 5 Hotkeys to instantly access built- in Licensed apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hotstar, YouTube and Google Play with plenty of Indian apps and content too.

categories.name: Gifts & Articles
categories.description: A garment or outfit consists of one to three pieces such as party clothes, tailored suits, vest, slacks, shirt or skirt. Active sportswear and/or coats are acceptable as Fashion Revue entries b) Blouses, shirts, and sweaters are usually considered as garments if they are used to complete the outfit.
